Description: Rim sherd of North Ionian Late Wild Goat Style pottery dinos; pale slip; interior: black band at top of wall, reserved below; stepped maeander frieze on top of rim, edge glazed; black band below neck and shoulder join; on shoulder, large floral/star pattern at left; maeander or square pattern at right.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Ure Museum of Greek Archaeology, Reading. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: CVA Reading I / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum Great Britain, Fasc. 12, University of Reading (p. 37, pl. 22, no. 26)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.400)
